reviewDetails.comment: Great experience

I went to Dr. Zysman as referred by my personal doctor.  I went to see her because I had an allergy that cannot be cured by OTC medication.  She examined the spot where I had my allergy and she recommended or rather she prescribed to use triamcinolone cream to apply it twice a day and another ointment called Mupirocin to also apply it twice a day for two weeks.  After two weeks, it was gone and my skin felt like baby skin.  From now on, I will go to her every time I have some kind of problems regarding my skin.  I would recommend anyone of my friends if they have problems with their skin to go see her.

Dr Zysman is an excellent dr. She is very dedicated and extremely caring ! She spends a good amount of time with you and does a very careful examination . I have been a patient for a long time and would highly recommend her .
Courteous and professional
